LanguageData.SK_Power.label: 电力
LanguageData.SK_Power.description: Learn the basics of power generation to help your colonists survive in this harsh climate. This advancement unlocks conduits and batteries。
LanguageData.SK_RenewableI.label: 可再生能源 I
LanguageData.SK_RenewableI.description: Learn the basics of power generation from renewable resourses of this planet. This advancement unlocks Wind Turbine。
LanguageData.SolarPanels.label: 可再生能源 II
LanguageData.SolarPanels.description: Further advancements in power technology, give your colonists the ability to harness the power of the sun. Unlocks the solar powered generator。
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.label: 可再生能源 III
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.description: What do you do when the sun doesn't shine? Solar power is great, except when it's dark! This advancement in power generation unlocks the geothermal generator that can harness the power of the planet!
LanguageData.SK_RenewableIV.label: 可再生能源 IV
LanguageData.SK_RenewableIV.description: Allows to build advanced power plants: Gauss wind turbine and thermoelectric generator。
LanguageData.SK_RenewableV.label: 可再生能源 V
LanguageData.SK_RenewableV.description: Allows to build advanced power plants: Gauss wind turbine and thermoelectric generator。
LanguageData.SK_ConvectionalI.label: Conventional power I
LanguageData.SK_ConvectionalI.description: Learn the basics of power generation from conventional resources of this planet. This advancement unlocks Steam Generator。
LanguageData.SK_ConvectionalII.label: Conventional power II
LanguageData.SK_ConvectionalII.description: Further advancements in power technology, give your colonists the ability to use some convectional resources fo obtaining electricity. Unlocks the Coal Power Plant。
LanguageData.SK_ConvectionalIII.label: Conventional power III
LanguageData.SK_ConvectionalIII.description: Allows to build advanced power plant for refining some fuel - Fuel Power Plant。
LanguageData.SK_PlasmaI.label: Plasma power I
LanguageData.SK_PlasmaI.description: Allows to build advanced power plant - Tesla Lightning Generator。
LanguageData.SK_PlasmaII.label: Plasma power II
LanguageData.SK_PlasmaII.description: Open secrets of electromagnetics. Allows to build eco-friendly plasma generators。
LanguageData.SK_PlasmaIII.label: Plasma power III
LanguageData.SK_PlasmaIII.description: Dynamic Electromagnetics allows you to fabricate advanced buildings using electromagnetic components. This unlocks the upper tier of power generation and technology found in every Glitter world installation for building Xenon-Ion Turbine。
LanguageData.AirConditioning.label: Infrastructure I
LanguageData.AirConditioning.description: Allows you to build different Lamps, Small coolers and heaters and some Vents. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent。
LanguageData.Autodoors.label: Infrastructure II
LanguageData.Autodoors.description: Allows you to build Autodoors, Medium coolers and heaters, Utility Walls. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent。
LanguageData.ColoredLights.label: Colored lights
LanguageData.ColoredLights.description: Allows colonists to construct colored lights for decorative purposes。
LanguageData.Batteries.label: Infrastructure III
LanguageData.Batteries.description: Allows you to build Hi-Tech Research Bench, Heavy Power Conduits, Hidden Conduits and Industrial coolers and heaters. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent。
LanguageData.LEDTechnologyScience.label: LED Technology
LanguageData.LEDTechnologyScience.description: Allows the construction of more efficient lights and other buildings。
LanguageData.SK_InfrastructureIV.label: Infrastructure IV
LanguageData.SK_InfrastructureIV.description: Allows you to build some advanced Ductwork Elements, Geothermal Heaters and Fission Batteries。
LanguageData.SK_NuclearI.label: Nuclear power I
LanguageData.SK_NuclearI.description: Advanced knowledge of power generation allows you to build some Gas Centrifuge。
LanguageData.SK_NuclearII.label: Nuclear power II
LanguageData.SK_NuclearII.description: Geothermal power is great, except when you can't find a steam vent! Advanced knowledge of power generation allows you to build a nuclear reactor。
